actions.args: {"body": {"name": "Travel Stipend [Redacted] [Team GBH]", "summary": "As a developer and builder, I have had the privilege of participating in and winning two of your previous hackathons. These experiences have allowed me to contribute to public goods funding projects that align with your organization\\\\\\'s goals. Please help us get to Redacted. ", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "I am Bigtide and I represent team GBH. I have participated and won in 2 past near hackathons (EthSeoul2024 / NEAR HZN). These experiences have allowed me to contribute to public goods funding projects that align with NEAR foundation\\\\\\'s goals. Furthermore, I am associated with Ludium, a successful collaborator of NEAR, as I know.  \\\\nMe and my other team member (Chanho) want to participate in Redacted IRL. Given our shared commitment to building impactful solutions, I would greatly appreciate any support you can provide to help facilitate my participation. \\\\n\\\\n# Plan for Redacted\\\\nWe have previously deployed \\\\\\'Dead Project Snipper\\\\\\' project as part of AI-PGF initiative. Dead Project Snipper aggregates data points to access whether Grant Project is active or inactive. We are looking to update the frontend and other features to continue the development and present it in Redacted Hackathon. \\\\n\\\\n# Travel Plan / Cost\\\\nI will be deaprting from South Korea, heading to Bangkok. \\\\n\\\\nFlight: Average round trip from Korea(Incheon) to Bangkok is about $300 - $350 per person.\\\\nStay: The average stay is 30 - 50 $USD per night per person. For 3 nights that would be 90 - 150 $USD\\\\nFood: Average food cost is expected to be $15-20 per day per person. For 3 days that would be 45 - 60 $USD\\\\nTotal: All things considered, I would like to ask for 1000 $USDC in total, $500 per person. \\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "bigtide.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131149307}

{"data": {"events-committee.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Bounty* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @bigtide.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}Travel Stipend [Redacted] [Team GBH]\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nAs a developer and builder, I have had the privilege of participating in and winning two of your previous hackathons. These experiences have allowed me to contribute to public goods funding projects that align with your organization\\\\\\'s goals. Please help us get to Redacted. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/events-committee.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=105)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"proposal": {"id": 105, "snapshot": {"name": "Travel Stipend [Redacted] [Team GBH]", "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"], "summary": "As a developer and builder, I have had the privilege of participating in and winning two of your previous hackathons. These experiences have allowed me to contribute to public goods funding projects that align with your organization\\\\\\'s goals. Please help us get to Redacted. ", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "editor_id": "bigtide.near", "timestamp": "1729841954334271985", "supervisor": null, "description": "I am Bigtide and I represent team GBH. I have participated and won in 2 past near hackathons (EthSeoul2024 / NEAR HZN). These experiences have allowed me to contribute to public goods funding projects that align with NEAR foundation\\\\\\'s goals. Furthermore, I am associated with Ludium, a successful collaborator of NEAR, as I know.  \\\\nMe and my other team member (Chanho) want to participate in Redacted IRL. Given our shared commitment to building impactful solutions, I would greatly appreciate any support you can provide to help facilitate my participation. \\\\n\\\\n# Plan for Redacted\\\\nWe have previously deployed \\\\\\'Dead Project Snipper\\\\\\' project as part of AI-PGF initiative. Dead Project Snipper aggregates data points to access whether Grant Project is active or inactive. We are looking to update the frontend and other features to continue the development and present it in Redacted Hackathon. \\\\n\\\\n# Travel Plan / Cost\\\\nI will be deaprting from South Korea, heading to Bangkok. \\\\n\\\\nFlight: Average round trip from Korea(Incheon) to Bangkok is about $300 - $350 per person.\\\\nStay: The average stay is 30 - 50 $USD per night per person. For 3 nights that would be 90 - 150 $USD\\\\nFood: Average food cost is expected to be $15-20 per day per person. For 3 days that would be 45 - 60 $USD\\\\nTotal: All things considered, I would like to ask for 1000 $USDC in total, $500 per person. \\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "bigtide.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "bigtide.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "Event Committee contributor and expenses (Oct 14 - Oct 25, 2024)", "summary": "A summary of all completed work activities between the specified date range and all planned work for the next pay period plus expenses.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "Summary of Work Activities: Event Committee contributor and expenses (Oct 14 - Oct 25, 2024)\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n* Attended regular calls with the Event Committee DevHub \\\\n* Attended calls with DevHub DevRel lead, NEAR Foundation and REDACTED team.\\\\n* Contribute to planning and execution of REDACTED hackathon communications.\\\\n* Planned NEAR presence at ETHGlobal San Francisco  (October  18-20, 2024)\\\\n* Planned NEAR presence at Pragma San Francisco (October 16-17, 2024)\\\\n* Execute booth and swag production for ETHGlobal San Francisco, Chiang Mai Hacker House (swag support), [REDACTED] IRL EVENT AND ETHGLOBAL Bangkok\\\\n* Planning for DevHub presence at REDACTED and ETH Bangkok (November 15-17, 2024)\\\\n* Work at Pragma San Francisco and ETHGlobal San Francisco Hackathon\\\\n\\\\nExpenses:\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n* Transportation: $ 317.04\\\\n* Meals: $ 20.00\\\\n\\\\nTotal Expenses: $ 317.04\\\\n\\\\nTimeline\\\\n\\\\nStart: Oct 14, 2024\\\\n\\\\nEnd date: October 25, 2024\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours per week: 20\\\\n\\\\nOvertime: 34 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 74\\\\n\\\\nHourly rate: $50/hr\\\\n\\\\nTotal: $ 3,700.00\\\\n\\\\nTotal amount requested: $ 4,017.04\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "josecouto.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "4017", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": ["Hackathon"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131179250}

{"body": {"name": " Travel Stipend [Redacted] - Bangkok, Nov. 2024", "summary": "I am a Computer Vision and blockchain specialist with over 9 years of experience. Having transitioned from 6 years in AI research to blockchain technology, I am now in my third year of blockchain core development and zero-knowledge proof research. Through this Redacted Hackathon, I aim to showcase unique use cases that merge blockchain and AI, while exploring and engaging with various NEAR ecosystem projects.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "Project: Ludium\\\\u{2019}s Web3 Builder Bounty Platform\\\\nDetails: A platform where sponsors create bounties for community members to apply, submit results, and receive rewards. The project will feature algorithm-based builder profile analysis, team matching, and a multichain settlement feature via Chain Abstraction.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nTravel Plan & Costs\\\\n\\\\n1. Flight:\\\\n\\\\nDescription: Round trip flight from Seoul, South Korea, to Bangkok, Thailand\\\\nCost: $300\\\\n\\\\n2. Accommodation:\\\\nDescription: 3-night stay from November 8-11\\\\nCost: $200\\\\n\\\\nTotal Cost: $500", "linked_proposals": [75], "receiver_account": "72a22c2c0c6b1dad2d56b973db1afb685cdb85241ed3271866dc21e2bf3450c6", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131221382}

{"body": {"name": "Travel Stipend [REDACTED] IRL Bangkok 2024", "summary": "I\\\\\\'m Daniel, a web3 developer from Poland actively contributing to the NEAR ecosystem. I recently won the Chain Signatures prize at EthDam hackathon and have previous experience participating in the NEAR Lisbon 2023 hackathon with the partyngo project. I\\\\\\'m applying for a travel stipend to attend [REDACTED] in Bangkok to continue building in the NEAR ecosystem.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "**NEAR Contributions & Achievements**\\\\n* Winner of Chain Signatures prize at EthDam hackathon 2024\\\\n* Participant in NEAR Lisbon hackathon with partyngo project\\\\n* Currently developing NEAR support for our solver network available on EVM chains\\\\n* Experience with Chain Signatures and NEAR smart contracts\\\\n\\\\n**Prior Hackathon Experience**\\\\n* EthDam 2024 - Winner of Chain Signatures prize\\\\n* NEAR Lisbon Hackathon - Contributed to partyngo project\\\\n* 1 place in Open Track at EthSofia 2024\\\\n* 3 place in Meridian London 2024 hackathon\\\\n* Encode London 2023 Finalist \\\\n\\\\n**Hackathon Project Plan**\\\\nFor the [REDACTED] I want to develop a chain-abstracted network of intent solvers. The project should enable users to submit intent-based orders across multiple EVM chains, with solvers competing to find best execution paths for different defi protocols.\\\\n\\\\n**Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs**\\\\nDeparture: Poland \\\\u{2192} Bangkok\\\\nReturn: Bangkok \\\\u{2192} Poland\\\\n\\\\nBreakdown of costs:\\\\n* Flights: ~$800 USD\\\\n* Local transportation and other expenses: ~$100 USD\\\\nTotal Estimated Cost: $900 USD\\\\n\\\\n**Why Support My Participation**\\\\n1. Proven track record of building successful projects in the NEAR ecosystem\\\\n2. Recent recognition through Chain Signatures prize at EthDam\\\\n3. Strong technical background in web3 development(full-time in crypto for 4+ years)\\\\n\\\\n**Links**\\\\n* EthDam Chain Signatures Prize Project - https://github.com/CallBackProtocol\\\\n* EthSofia Cypherpunk CRM(1st prize) - https://github.com/JustAnotherDevv/EthSofia", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "d8ec79eb56fc32853ef9f6e6f12e6a85949f6ed9dfe8c385793cc07503481bac", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "900", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131253465}
